ticket.title: SQLite 2 Adapter should not try to add columns while in a transaction
ticket.original-body: The SQLite3 adapter checks before trying to add a column to a table that we're not already in a transaction (which causes the add to fail). SQLite2 adapter does not. This causes test_sqlite_add_column_in_transaction_raises_statement_invalid to fail under SQLite2 only. Attached patch adds the check for SQLite2.
